resources.string: This is currently a work in progress. For now, it should just ask you for location permissions
For any concerns, please contact me at @Elite_Soba
You cannot add this widget from this screen. You must add it via the home screen. Exact instructions vary.
Field to show the current date and day
Field to show the current time
Image to hold the Persona 4 datetime circle
Image to hold the current weather
Filler box to force aspect ratio
